conversation.message: I don’t know how to say this, but my mother is in the hospital and needs surgery immediately.
Oh no, I’m so sorry to hear that. What can I do to help?
I hate to ask, but we’re short on funds. I don’t know where else to turn. Could you lend me $1,500?
Thank you. I just...I didn’t know who else to ask. You’ve been such a blessing in my life.
I'm happy to support you. Family is everything, right?
You have no idea how much this means. I can’t wait to show my mom who helped her.
I hope she gets better soon. Keep me updated, okay?
